landing.bio: Hi! I am Zeeshan Equbal, an Electrical and Electronics Undergraduate from BIT Mesra. A Competitive programmer, Web Developer and Data Science enthusiast who loves to play Badminton. I am a self-motivated guy, eager to learn anything life has to offer. I am always ready to get my hands dirty on technologies that I find rather interesting.

experience.aboutWork: I am responsible for the front-end as well as back-end development of the website of IETE. I work with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and React for frontend and JavaScript for backend.

We are a bunch of like minded people who love to mingle and play with data and are eager to contribute to the world of data science. I am a part of the Data Analyst team and I am responsible for Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA).

education.degree: B.Tech in Electrical and Electronics Engineering

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from Web Development, I also love Competitive Programming at
interests.paragraphTwo: When I am outdoors, I love to play Badminton with my friends.

awards.awardDetail: Attended Google certified workshop on Machine Learning and Deep Learning.
